resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">God, wearing a crown similar to a papal tiara<span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;"> (a common convention in Netherlandish painting).
resource.chars: God, wearing a crown similar to a papal tiara (a common convention in Netherlandish painting).

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">Ipse dīxit, et facta sunt, <em style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">For he spoke and it was done (<span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">Psalm 33:9).
resource.chars: Ipse dīxit, et facta sunt, For he spoke and it was done (Psalm 33:9).
